value.string:
DELETE FROM
 software_release
 WHERE
 <dtml-in uid>
 delivery_line_uid=<dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 ;
 
 <dtml-var "'\0'">
 
 <dtml-let row_list="[]">
 <dtml-in prefix="loop" expr="_.range(_.len(uid))">
 <dtml-if "PurchasePackingListLine_getPublicComputerUid[loop_item]">
 <dtml-call expr="row_list.append(loop_item)">
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 
 <dtml-if "row_list">
 INSERT INTO
 software_release (delivery_line_uid, computer_uid, uid, software_release_title, software_release_version, software_release_url, image_relative_url, state)
 VALUES
 <dtml-in prefix="row" expr="row_list">
 (
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="uid[row_item]" type="int">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getPublicComputerUid[row_item]" type="int">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getSoftwareReleaseUid[row_item]" type="int">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getSoftwareReleaseTitle[row_item]" type="string">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getSoftwareReleaseVersion[row_item]" type="string">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getSoftwareReleaseUrlString[row_item]" type="string">,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="PurchasePackingListLine_getSoftwareReleaseImageUrl[row_item]" type="string" optional>,
 <dtml-sqlvar expr="getSimulationState[row_item]" type="string">
 )
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else>,</dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-let>
